title: Harry.Potter.Complete.1080p.BlurayMUX
description:
This is a BlurayMUX of the following Bluray -- Harry Potter: The Complete Series



IMDB HP1: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0241527/

IMDB HP2: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0295297/

IMDB HP3: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0304141/

IMDB HP4: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0330373

IMDB HP5: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0373889

IMDB HP6: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0417741

IMDB HP7: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0926084

IMDB HP8: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1201607



The content is a MUX, which means the audio & video streams are untouched, thus preserving the full, original quality of the content. 

This is the original content - untouched in any way. This means this is the HIGHEST possible quality. 

Note: Once you transcode it (e.g. AVC to HEVC or TrueHD to HE-AAC), the quality will be reduced. This is because youâ€™re converting from a lossy format to another lossy format. :) 

Note: The studio mastered the movie collection with two different formats: earlier films in VC-1 and later films in AVC; corresponding formats for audio as well with DD 5.1 for the earlier films and TrueHD & DTS-HD MA for the later films.

Source: Blu-ray disks
Video: AVC   , VC-1   
Audio: DD 5.1, TrueHD 5.1, DTS-HD MA 5.1
Subtitles: English

All content was viewed before uploading, so I know there are zero artifacts.

Enjoy! :)
